title: AI-Driven Web Assistant Developer
description: We are looking for an intern to build AI-powered web tools with a focus on conversational assistants. You will be creating backend APIs, building interactive dashboards, and integrating cloud-based NLP models. Ideal for those interested in AI applications and scalable full-stack systems.
role:
Develop RESTful APIs using Node.js
Build dynamic interfaces with React
Work on NLP pipelines using Python
Integrate services with AWS Lambda and DynamoDB
Participate in agile sprints with cross-functional teams
